name: Cards
body:
Rummy like cards design using css and jquery. For animation, we have used [jquery.transit.js](http://ricostacruz.com/jquery.transit/source.html).

We can create peacock feather like design using this as well.
tagline: Rummy like cards design using css and jquery.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
